title: Five-Star Indulgence in the Heart of Seminyak
description: Experience luxury in the heart of stylish Seminyak at The Trans Resort Bali, together with a host of indulgent inclusions. Stay for eight nights in a Premier Room with daily buffet breakfasts, private airport pickup, a buffet dining experience, a weekend yum cha lunch, a 60-minute spa treatment each, rooftop cocktails, late checkout and special savings around Seminyak including daily tacos at Mexicola and daily shuttle to Potato Head and much more for just $799 per adult (twin share), valued up to $4,589. Plus, up to two kids stay free. Watch the resort video below.
location_description: The Trans Resort Bali [208095] The Trans Resort September 2017*

title: Iconic Beachfront Bali Escape at Indonesia's #1 Resort
description: This celebrity favourite and legend of Bali’s Nusa Dua beachfront is back. Mulia Resort is one of the top resorts in the world: awarded one of 'The Best Beach Resorts in the World' by Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards 2018 and voted #1 Resort Hotels in Indonesia 2019 by Travel + Leisure World's Best Awards. Indulge in some of Bali’s finest dining - and some of the best buffets in Asia - with gourmet inclusions such as daily buffet breakfast (regarded as one of the 'best buffet breakfasts in Bali'), three sumptuous buffet dinners, a cocktail for each adult at the chic ZJ’s Bar & Lounge. Plus, enjoy a blissful 30-minute treatment per person at the resort’s ultra-luxurious spa and return transfers from Bali’s international airport.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan Kawasan Sawangan, Nusa Dua, Kuta Selatan, Benoa, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Secluded Ubud Paradise with Indulgent Dining Experiences
description: Amid Ubud’s rolling rice paddies and exotic allure, discover Tanadewa Resort & Spa - a heavenly hideaway where you can enjoy butler service and gourmet dining. Rejuvenate your body and refresh your mind with daily à la carte breakfast, two two-course dinners, daily afternoon tea, one daily cocktail per adult, a relaxing 60-minute water massage for two and a one-way airport transfer.
offer_address: Jl. Padang Getas, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Fairmont Luxury on Bali's East Coast with Exotic Dining Inclusions
description: Step into an all-suite-and-villa resort perched on 200 metres of azure beachfront and nestled amidst four hectares of lush tropical gardens at the A-list Fairmont Sanur Beach Bali featuring a spectacular 50-metre waterfront infinity pool. Part of the iconic Fairmont Hotels International Collection, you’ll enjoy a seven or nine-night stay in a huge 90sqm suite at the only luxury resort in Sanur that boasts ocean views. Includes daily a la carte breakfast including one sunrise beach breakfast, two three-course dinners, two poolside cocktails to share, Balinese cooking class for two, three hours of blissful massages to share and much more.
offer_address: Jl. Kusuma Sari No.8, Sanur, Denpasar Sel., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80227, Indonesia

title: Private Pool Villa Escape with Indulgent Dining Inclusions
description: Find your slice of jungle paradise with an escape in the heart of Bali. Nestled between an unspoiled landscape of volcanoes, tranquil waterfalls and scenic rice paddies, Senetan Villas & Spa Resort is located just 30-minutes from Ubud. Embrace tranquility with a stay in a One Bedroom Villa complete with a private pool and enjoy daily breakfast, your choice of daily multi-course lunch or dinner, daily afternoon tea, a guided village tour, 60-minute massage, a foot massage ritual on arrival, a guaranteed 1pm late checkout and a one-way airport transfer.
offer_address: Ds. Payangan Br. Penginyahan, Ds. Puhu, Payangan 80572, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Wellness Retreat with All-Inclusive Meals
description: Experience a five-star wellness getaway in the centre of Bali. Nestled between an unspoiled landscape of volcanoes, tranquil waterfalls and scenic rice paddies, Saranam Resort & Spa is located just one hour from Ubud. Enjoy five or seven nights of tranquility in this all-meals-included escape featuring a private transfer to or from the airport, daily minibar refill, two 60-minute massages and two 30-minute reflexology treatments to share alongside daily meditation and yoga classes. Plus, there are no blackout dates!
offer_address: Jalan Raya Baturiti, Br. Pacung, Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia

description: Experience a five-star wellness getaway in the centre of Bali. Nestled between an unspoiled landscape of volcanoes, tranquil waterfalls and scenic rice paddies, the Royal Tulip Saranam is located just one hour from Ubud. Enjoy five or seven nights of tranquility in this all-meals-included escape featuring a private transfer to or from the airport, daily minibar refill, two 60-minute massages and two 30-minute reflexology treatments to share, daily meditation and yoga classes, a personal wellness adviser and 15% off all spa treatments at the Royal Dedari Spa. location_description: Royal Tulip Saranam Resort & Spa - July 2018*
offer_address: Jalan Raya Baturiti, Br. Pacung, Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia

title: Unearth Bali's Hidden Treasures at this Secluded Beachfront Resort
description: Discover a secret side of Bali at The Lovina Villas, a beachfront resort perfectly located for dolphin watching. Nestled between the Bedugul mountain range and the Bali Sea, the resort is located in Lovina, an area best known for being home to a huge dolphin population and Bali's best-preserved coral reef. Unwind in your private pool villa with daily breakfast and afternoon tea, nightly three-course dinners, one daily cocktail each and more included.
offer_address: Jl. Mas Lovina, Kalibukbuk Lovina, Kecamatan Buleleng, Anturan, Kec. Buleleng, Singaraja, Bali 81151, Indonesia

title: Relaxed Bali Jungle Paradise near Ubud with Daily Breakfast & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Enjoy some well-earned rest and indulge in peaceful tranquillity deep in the heart of the jungle in one of Aksari Resort Ubud’s relaxing suites. The impressive resort boasts unparalleled, sweeping views of Bali's picturesque, lush green valleys accompanied by the finest traditional Balinese touches. Found just 25 minutes from the centre of Ubud, spend your days exploring one of Bali's hotspots or visit the Tegallalang Rice Terrace, a much-loved attraction for tourists from all over the globe. Closer to home, embrace the air of romance found across the resort and take a dip in the cascading infinity pool perched over the jungle, offering seemingly endless views of the verdant forest.

Where breathtaking beauty and serenity meet, this resort is the perfect destination if relaxation is at the front of your mind. Indulge in a well-earned massage or spa treatmeant at Svaha Spa - the perfect place to refresh and recharge both your body and your mind. Then, finish each day on a high note with a delicious cocktail and dining experience at one of the resort's fine restaurants - dive into authentic Indonesian cuisine at Ankhusa or sample Japanese bites at the onsite Kojin Teppanyaki Restaurant.
offer_address: Jalan Raya Desa Kenderan No.88x, Ubud, Bali 80561, Indonesia

title: Grand Re-Opening: Experience the Newly Refurbished Montigo Resorts Seminyak with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Discover the new lifestyle resort concept at Montigo Resorts Seminyak: a newly refurbished oasis located in the heart of Bali’s most cosmopolitan district, perfect for family and couples alike. Find your slice of island paradise as you enjoy daily breakfast, two three-course dinners at the resort’s popular Tiigo Restaurant, a nightly cocktail per person, a 60-minute Balinese massage for two and a convenient airport pick-up from Bali's Denpasar Airport. With family options available and unlimited access to the spectacular Kids Club open every day until 11pm, Montigo Resorts Seminyak is the ideal destination for an unforgettable family holiday.
offer_address: Kerobokan Klod 83061, Bali, Indonesia

description: Spoil the family and experience a slice of tropical paradise in the heart of Legian at one of Bali's favourite beachfront resorts. Two adults can spend eight nights at the Pullman Bali Legian Beach (with kids under 11 staying free, with breakfast included and unlimited kids club access), enjoying daily buffet breakfasts, three themed buffet dinners, four 60-minute massages, a daily beer for each adult, convenient airport pickup, complimentary use of the Connectivity Lounge before or after your flight, 30% off buffet dinners and spa treatments plus 20% off beverages for two adults.

title: Ultra-Luxe Bali Beachfront Paradise - Belmond Jimbaran
description: Experience a five-star Bali beachfront paradise at Belmond Jimbaran Puri, one of the renowned Belmond group's ultra-luxurious hotels. If you're looking for a romantic escape, you've found it! Enjoy five nights of island indulgence with direct beach access to Jimbaran Beach, famous for its stunning sunsets and eclectic seafood markets. Enjoy sunset cocktails and two, exotic three-course seafood dinners delivered daily by the markets along with daily buffet breakfasts, convenient airport pickup, massages and more included for two adults.
offer_address: Jalan Uluwatu, Yoga Perkanthi Lane, Jimbaran - South Kuta - Badung Regency, Bali, 80361

title: Five-Star Suites & Villas in Bali
description: Take luxury to new heights with five nights of clifftop indulgence at the award-winning Samabe Bali Suites & Villas in Nusa Dua. Includes return airport transfers, 24-hour butler service, daily buffet breakfasts, daily afternoon tea in a beach cave, an Indonesian Rijstaffel (rice table) dining experience, daily replenished minibar with beers, daily free-flowing non-alcoholic drinks and more.

title: Spectacular Uluwatu Escape with Exquisite Dining Inclusions and Nightly Drinks
description: Secluded luxury and endless ocean views await at the award-winning Renaissance Bali Uluwatu Resort & Spa - a sanctuary of serenity surrounded by dramatic cliffs, brought to you by the internationally renowned Marriott brand. Experience modern luxury at its finest, soak up the chilled-out vibes of Uluwatu and receive the full VIP treatment at this lifestyle resort with daily buffet breakfast, a traditional Balinese buffet dinner, two lavish two-course dining experiences, nightly cocktails, two 45-minute massages per adult and a convenient airport pick up from Bali's Denpasar Airport.

description: Indulge in French-inspired elegance at the five-star Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua resort, nestled on a pristine white-sand beach. Relax at the So Spa, the generous lagoon pool or at the resort’s crowning glory: the brand-new Manarai Beach House club. Included in your stay is daily breakfast, four gourmet dinners, one 45-minute massage each, airport pick-up and one cocktail each at Sofitel’s glamorous new beach club. Plus, up to two children aged eight and under stay for free, including daily breakfast and Kids’ Club access.

title: Five-Star Private Villa in Bali
description: Check in to an Indonesian paradise and experience a true starry-eyed escape in your own stylish 200sqm villa with a private pool. title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Nusa Dua Hillside Luxury with Massages, Daily Breakfast & One-Way Airport Transfer
description:
Embraced by the lush, palm-fringed hills of Nusa Dua in southern Bali is Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort: a brand-new, five-star oasis from the world-renowned Marriott collection. The Balinese-inspired design marries the finest facilities to create a serene brand of luxury, unique to this hillside sanctuary.

Feel everyday life melt away as you lounge beside the glittering pools, moving only to refresh your drink at Atomic 17 poolside bar. Live the Balinese lifestyle at the Beach Club just a short distance away, sip cocktails and cold-brew coffee in the artsy R Bar and indulge in international and Asian flavours at the exciting onsite restaurants. The sparkling new spa awaits to indulge body and soul, while there’s a fitness centre on hand for those looking to maintain their regime. Plus, if you can tear yourself away from the resort, Nusa Dua’s soft-sand beaches are just a short 10-minute drive away.
offer_address: Kawasan Pariwisata Lot SW 4 & 5, Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan, Benoa South Kuta, Badung Regency Bali 80363 Indonesia

title: Secluded Jungle Villa with Indulgent Dining and Spa Inclusions
description: Find your slice of jungle paradise at Nandini Jungle Resort & Spa, a serene sanctuary set amid the timeless landscape of Ubud, staying in a brand-new Jungle Royal Suite. Discover why this striking resort was awarded a 2019 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence as you enjoy daily breakfast, a two-course lunch and dinner for two, a 60-minute massage each, a daily yoga class, daily afternoon tea and minibar refill, a welcome drink with fresh fruit plus a 15-minute relaxing massage on arrival, and so much more.
offer_address: Br, Jl. Susut, Buahan, Payangan, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80572, Indonesia

title: Iconic W Bali Five-Star Seminyak Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Daily Resort Credit & Couples Massage
description:
Step off a plane and into paradise at the iconic W Bali - Seminyak, and experience a stay that is just as energetic or as relaxed as you want it to be. This five-star beachfront oasis brings you the best of Bali, with four rice paddy-inspired swimming pools flanked by palm trees and ornate design details that reflect the island's rich culture and perfectly complement the W's signature eclectic aesthetic.

Here, the extraordinary replaces the ordinary thanks to out-of-this-world facilities. Dine in style in one of the four uber-trendy restaurants and bars onsite, including Starfish Bloo and FIRE to satisfy your cravings for exciting international fare, visit AWAY Spa to dial up the indulgence, burn some energy at FIT gym or escape it all and relax to the sounds of crashing waves in a beachfront cabana. If you can be tempted away from this breathtaking resort and its unbeatable facilities, the wonders of Seminyak are right on your doorstep. Dynamic and exciting, Seminyak is home to vibrant nightlife, world-class restaurants, boutique shops and a pristine beach. Access all this on foot and lose yourself exploring the best of this buzzing beachside town.
offer_address: Jl. Petitenget, Denpasar, Bali 80361, Indonesia Seminyak, Indonesia

title: Luxe Villa Break with Daily Dining & Massages
description: Following in the footsteps of its popular Seminyak sister property, Maca Villas & Spa Umalas welcomes you to enjoy a relaxing Bali getaway. Located between Seminyak and Canggu, you will be perfectly placed for enjoying some of the island’s best beaches, shopping and nightlife. This fabulous getaway includes daily breakfast and afternoon tea, three three-course dinners, one daily 30-minute massage per person, a daily cocktail each and more.
offer_address: Jalan Umalas Klecung, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kerobokan Kelod, Badung, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

description: Explore the hidden beauty of Bali at The Kryamaha Villas, nestled into the tranquil Tabanan Regency. Less crowded than many other areas, Tabanan is abundant in lush green rice paddies, quiet beaches and beautiful Balinese temples. Stay in a luxurious one-bedroom villa with private pool and enjoy daily in-villa breakfast, daily dinner and afternoon tea, a daily cocktail per person, a one-way private airport transfer, one 60-minute Balinese massage per person and more.

title: Adults-Only Wellness Retreat with All-Inclusive Meals and Daily Massage
description: This romantic spa resort is a true adults-only Balinese escape, tucked away on the tip of the island's northeastern coast. Part of the exclusive collection of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, this private wellness retreat has played host to A-listers like Keira Knightley, attesting to its high-end status and exclusive ambience. Get back on track at the award-winning Spa Village Resort Tembok, Bali with all-inclusive, nutritious à la carte dining, daily personalised 50-minute massages for two, private return airport transfers and daily complimentary activities such as a variety of yoga and fitness circuits, healthy cooking classes, Balinese craft making, starlight gazing and more.
location_description: Spa Village Resort Tembok Bali Nov2019
offer_address: Jalan Singaraja-Amlapura No. 100, Desa Tembok, Tejakula, Sambirenteng, Tembok, Tejakula, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81173, Indonesia

title: Unique Bali Safari Experience
description: Enjoy a safari experience in Bali at the Mara River Safari Lodge. Set within the grounds of the lush Bali Safari Park, you’ll wake up to zebras, rhinos and more grazing outside your tropical accommodation, with an open-air terrace for wildlife viewing. Make the most of being immersed in nature with one thrilling night safari for two included in your escape. You’ll also enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one buffet lunch for two, one BBQ dinner for two, a framed photo of your experience and unlimited access to the safari park.
offer_address: Jl. Bypass Prof. Dr. Ida Bagus Mantra Km. 19,8, Bali, Gianyar, Indonesia Bali 80361 Indonesia

title: Five-Star Westin Ubud Jungle Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Massages (Select Packages Only)
description:
Find serenity in the heart of Ubud's lush forest with a five-star stay at The Westin Resort & Spa Ubud, Bali, celebrated for its integrated natural design, next level luxury and impeccable facilities, including a jungle-facing infinity pool and decadent spa. The two onsite restaurants work under an ethos of balanced eating with healthy ingredients taking centre stage. Tabia restaurant offers an array of authentic local cuisine at the sumptuous buffet, while Tall Trees is inspired by Mediterranean flavours and overlooks the infinity pool with al fresco dining. To get the very best out of your surroundings, the resort has three viewing platforms showcasing the forest from multiple angles.

Whether you’re travelling with family or on a romantic escape, retreat to the comfort of your spacious room, suite or villa, filled with light and designed to maximise the breathtaking jungle views. Explore the forest scenery, discover serenity, and settle in for a luxurious stay you’ll remember for a lifetime.
location_description: The Westin Resort & Spa Ubud, Bali
offer_address: Jl. Lod Tunduh, Singakerta, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Canguu Five-Star Bali Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Daily Cocktails
description:
Escape to a romantic private pool villa retreat overlooking emerald-green rice fields at the charming Astera Villa Canggu. Nestled in southwest Bali in sought-after Canggu, this five-star haven offers a soothing refuge, framed by the lush foliage and rolling green hills that the region is renowned for. Elegant marble, polished wood and Balinese-inspired accents intertwine with modern design elements: luxurious open-plan villas await with sun-soaked terraces, each featuring a dreamy pool, for whiling away the hours basking in relaxation.

Float in the tranquil marble infinity pool overlooking a horizon of serenity. Re-energise your body with a soothing stroll through the surrounding foliage, indulge in traditional massage treatments while relishing beautiful natural landscapes at Svaha Spa or savour dazzling dishes served in the comfort of your private villa.
offer_address: Jl. Canggu Padang Linjong No.8x, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361

title: Tranquil Bali Private Pool Villa Escape near Canggu with Massages, All-Inclusive Dining & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Indulge in five-star bliss at the secluded Villa Jewel - a stunning five-bedroom Balinese sanctuary located in the traditional village of Cepaka. Cradled by rolling green rice terraces and tropical landscaped gardens, this idyllic haven is the perfect place to rest and recharge with friends or family. Masterfully designed to emulate the authentic Balinese experience, this villa combines traditional Balinese touches with contemporary modern stylings and first-class hospitality.

Spend sun-soaked days in the private infinity pool, kick back with a classic in the spacious media room, experience euphoria with a massage, or balance the mind, body and soul each morning at the peaceful yoga bale. For a day out, it's just a 20-minute drive to Canggu with its renowned surfing, world-class restaurants and activities to cater to all styles of travel.
offer_address: Jl. Ngurah Beng, Desa Cepaka, Selingsing, Banjar Cepaka, Kediri, Tabanan Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia

Relax in a stylish villa set in tropical gardens with a private swimming pool just moments from the beach, with relaxing massages, indulgent three-course dining experiences and more included.
offer_address: Jl. Sari Dewi No.18, Seminyak, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Beachfront Luxury in Beautiful Bali
description: Experience an award-winning Balinese paradise at The Royal Purnama Art Suites & Villas. Spend five nights in a one-bedroom Jacuzzi Suite near world-class surf breaks. Enjoy daily à la carte breakfasts, exotic dining experiences - including a beachside picnic and oceanfront seafood - nightly sunset canapés, a half-day Ubud tour, massages, return airport transfers and more for only $1,599 for two adults, valued up to $4,135. Watch the resort video below.
location_description: The Royal Purnama [204626] Tranquil Beachfront Luxury in Beautiful Bali
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Purnama, Kec. Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia Gianyar

title: Bali Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description: Trendy and tranquil, Bali Nyuh Gading Villa offers travellers a private Balinese escape in the peaceful Umalas area. Tucked conveniently between bustling Seminyak and quirky Canggu, this boutique resort provides a rare gift - secluded luxury moments from the vibrant nightlife, decadent eateries and white-sand beaches Bali is known for. Bali Nyuh Gading Villa is all about personalised service and generous hospitality. Blending traditional Balinese and contemporary design, each villa boasts private pools, spacious indoor and outdoor living areas and modern facilities, making this escape the perfect choice for honeymooners and dreamers alike. Be sure to check out some of Bali’s hottest nightlife in Seminyak, world-class surfing at Canggu’s beaches or take advantage of the resort’s boundless facilities, including an onsite restaurant, library and wellness spa, where you’re sure to be served with a smile.
offer_address: Jl. Umalas 1 No.99X, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Seminyak Bali 80361 Indonesia

title: Chic Beachside Studio Stay in Bali
description: Embark on an ideal sunny escape at Citadines Kuta Beach Bali, where you can unwind on the beach all day and hit the dancefloor at night. Located across the road from Kuta’s sandy beaches, you’ll be perfectly positioned to make the most of all Bali has to offer. Enjoy nightly drinks at the rooftop bar, two two-course dinners, daily buffet breakfast, a one-way transfer from Denpasar Airport and a guaranteed 1pm late checkout.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta  Badung, Bali 80361 Indonesia

title: Trans Villas Bali: Pool Villa Luxury in Seminyak
description: Escape to your own Balinese oasis; a huge and luxurious private pool villa at The Trans Villas - the premium villas of The Trans Resort Bali - in the heart of stylish Seminyak. Stay for six nights with airport pickup on arrival, daily buffet breakfasts, loads of dining experiences in the resort and around Seminyak, drinks at the rooftop bar and a rooftop massage each for two adults. Watch the exclusive resort video below.
location_description: The Trans Resort Bali [215243] Trans Villas*
offer_address: Kerobokan, Seminyak Bali Indonesia

title: Adults-Only Wellness Retreat with All-Inclusive Meals and Daily Massage
description: This romantic spa resort is a true adults-only Balinese escape, tucked away on the tip of the island's northeastern coast. Part of the exclusive collection of Small Luxury Hotels of the world, this private wellness retreat has played host to A-listers like Keira Knightley - attesting to its high-end status and exclusive ambience. Get back on track at the award-winning Spa Village Resort Tembok, Bali with all-inclusive, nutritious dining, daily personalised 50-minute massage for two, private return airport transfers and daily complimentary activities such as a variety of yoga and fitness circuits, healthy cooking classes, Balinese craft making, starlight gazing and more.
location_description: Spa Village Resort Tembok Bali - April 2019
offer_address: Jalan Singaraja-Amlapura No. 100, Desa Tembok, Tejakula, Sambirenteng, Tembok, Tejakula, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81173, Indonesia

title: Kanishka Luxury Villas: Jacuzzi and Pool Villas in Trendy Seminyak
description: Kanishka Villas are a collection of 27 private jacuzzi and pool villas, superbly located in the heart of Bali’s buzzing Seminyak. Stay six nights in a stunning Jacuzzi villa and soak up your indulgent inclusions such as daily breakfasts, a Balinese massage each, private in villa lunches, a dinner and two sunset cocktails, plus complimentary one-way airport transfers for two adults.
offer_address: Bali

title: The Ritz-Carlton, Bali: Iconic Five-Star Luxury
description: Experience The Ritz-Carlton’s most indulgent beachfront holiday at their ultra-glamorous, five-star Bali resort in Nusa Dua. The elite brand is renowned across the globe for providing the finest luxury accommodation and first-class service in breathtaking locations, and The Ritz-Carlton, Bali is no exception. Spoil yourself with a seven-night stay including daily buffet breakfast, choice of daily three-course lunch or dinner, a welcome drink on arrival, full use of the luxe Raku arrival and departure lounge and more. Up to two children aged three years and under stay free with kids’ meals included, plus complimentary kids’ club access for up to two children aged 11 years and under.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Nusa Dua Selatan, Lot Iii, Sawangan, Nusa Dua, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Bali Fitness Retreat with All-Inclusive Gourmet Meals
description: Reset your mind and body on an Active Escapes fitness retreat in Bali, where you’ll be trained by a team of highly qualified local and international experts while enjoying nutritious, gourmet all-inclusive dining. Aimed at active, like-minded travellers, all packages include six nights of Bali accommodation, return airport transfers, daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, all fitness training and equipment plus surf tuition and boards, three full-body massages, unlimited natural spring water to keep you hydrated, and more.
location_description: Padang Padang Inn/De Sapphire/Villa Laut/Eastin Ashta Resort
offer_address: Bali

title: Beachfront Bliss in the Heart of Kuta with Daily Breakfast & Daily Beers
description: Get away from it all and follow the sun to Bali’s vibrant Kuta, for a holiday to remember at Best Western Kuta Beach - perfectly positioned just steps from the best surf beaches, restaurants and shopping precincts of the island. Make this your ultimate Bali getaway with daily breakfast, a daily beer per person, two two-course dinners, return airport transfers and a late check out, subject to availability.
offer_address: Jl. Benesari Pantai Kuta, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Secluded Villa Luxury Minutes from Jimbaran Beach
description: Just steps from the white sands of one of Bali’s best beaches you’ll find Karma Jimbaran, a secluded villa hideaway from the renowned Karma Group. Here, superior service, lush tropical gardens and first-class facilities - including a brand-new spa - await. Perfect for groups of friends or families, each package is valid for four people, with a six-person upgrade available. Includes daily breakfast, two two-course dinners, a 60-minute massage each, return airport transfers, free transfers and entry to Karma’s Kandara Beach Club, and more.
offer_address: Jl. Bukit Permai, Jimbaran, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80362, Indonesia

title: Coastal Bali Escape with Four Pools, In-House Spa & Family Activities
description: Immerse yourself in absolute relaxation at Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa, an IHG Hotel, perfectly placed on the sparkling shores of Tanjung Benoa Beach. You'll be perfectly placed to treat yourself to a refreshing cocktail overlooking the ocean, try an exciting water sport or laze beside the pool all day long. Indulge in traditional Indonesian cuisine and international favourites with onsite dining, or melt away at the Tea Tree Spa while the kids play on the water slide or in the games room.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Pratama, No 86, Tanjung Benoa 80363, Bali, Indonesia

title: Beachfront Legian Family-Friendly Paradise with 10 Restaurants and Bars, Outdoor Pools & Spa
description:
Perfectly set on the golden sands of Legian Beach, this lively yet tranquil escape embraces the vibrant spirit of Bali. Spread across 10 acres of lush tropical gardens, this beachfront retreat blends authentic Balinese hospitality with a laid-back atmosphere in the heart of Legian - an ideal base for surfers, sunseekers and culture lovers alike.

Spend days unwinding by sparkling pools or at Usadha Spa, then sample your way through the hotel's 10 diverse restaurants and bars. Step beyond the resort to discover bustling markets, renowned surf spots and a rich mix of local dining. For family-friendly fun, head to Waterbom Bali, or enjoy a shopping spree at the stylish Discovery Mall.
offer_address: Jl. Melasti, Legian, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Beachfront Resort Minutes from the Airport
description: In family-friendly South Kuta, Holiday Inn Resort Baruna Bali, an IHG Hotel is your ticket to a relaxing beachfront stay. This sea-breeze sanctuary is the perfect place to bask in the sun, indulge in a soothing massage or relish a refreshing cocktail with Indian Ocean vistas from the beachfront Envy restaurant. Fancy a day out? Have fun in the sun as you slip and slide through Waterbom Bali, peruse beachside boutiques and barter at vibrant markets.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Baruna Bali, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Wana Segara No. 33, Tuban, Kuta, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Central Kuta Sanctuary with Onsite Restaurant & Bars, Oceanview Infinity Pool & Day Spa
description:
Balinese bliss awaits at this sophisticated Kuta staqy. Perfectly position on Bali’s most beloved beach, Mercure Kuta is just moments from all the island’s best action, including fantastic food, aquatic activities and a thriving nightlife.

Take a dip in the spectacular infinity pool, then retire to the onsite spa for a rejuvenating treatment. Watch a famous Bali sunset from ocean-facing Alang Alang Restaurant, savouring fragrant Asian and international dishes, then retire to your comfortable room for a restful evening in paradise.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Kuta 10 X, Br Pande Mas, Kuta 80361 Indonesia

title: Secluded Bali Seaside Hideaway with Beach Access, Onsite Dining & Day Spa
description:
Experience the tranquillity of Bali's east coast at this five-star Hyatt property, a serene sanctuary set between the sea and magnificent Mount Agung. Each suite and room boasts traditional Balinese design, with private terraces offering breathtaking ocean or garden views. 

Indulge in authentic Indonesian cuisine at Seasalt Restaurant, or enjoy a cocktail at the oceanfront bar. Then venture beyond the resort to discover the Tirta Gangga Water Palace, or explore the local market at Candidasa. Return to enjoy traditional massages and treatments to rejuvenate your mind, body and soul, or take a dip in the pool overlooking the sparkling sea.
offer_address: Desa Jalan Raya Buitan, Manggis, Karangasem, Bali, 80871, Indonesia

title: Refined Bali Airport Haven with Outdoor Pool, Two Bars & Onsite Spa
description:
Be perfectly placed for exploration at this tropical hotel, conveniently located just steps from I Gusti Ngurah Rai International Airport. This serene oasis offers a refreshing retreat from the hustle of Kuta, with a glittering outdoor pool, modern fitness centre and onsite spa. 

Savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at the onsite restaurant, The Square, or sip on a refreshing drink at the Run@way Bar or GOURMETBAR. Venture beyond the hotel to discover the vibrant beach clubs of Seminyak or the majestic Uluwatu Temple, both within easy reach.
offer_address: I Gusti Ngurah Rai International Airport, Jalan Airport Ngurah Rai, Tuban, Kuta, Bali 80362, Indonesia

title: Bali Secluded Sun-Drenched Sanctuary with Sea Views
description: Escape to a sun-drenched, secluded haven overlooking the shimmering ocean at Kimpton Naranta Bali on the island's peaceful southern peninsula. Head out to play a round of golf at the nearby Bali National Golf Club, take in tranquil Nusa Dua or bask in the sun on the pristine local beaches. On your return, you can indulge in a therapeutic treatment at the Samskara spa, enjoy a sumptuous meal at one of the innovative onsite restaurants or simply lounge in luxury by your private pool.
offer_address: Jalan Terompong, ITDC Lot S-5, Lingkungan Peminge, Benoa, Kuta Selatan, Badung, Bali 80363 Indonesia

vendor_name: Novotel Bali Nusa Dua - Hotel & Residences
title: Idyllic Novotel Bali Escape in the Heart of Nusa Dua with Lagoon Pool & Four Onsite Eateries
description:
Experience one of the world’s favourite beach destinations with a stay at this sun-drenched paradise, set amid five hectares of lush gardens surrounding a sprawling two-tier lagoon pool. Close to a private beach club that's reachable by complimentary shuttle, this escape guarantees fun in the sun.

Dine across four mouthwatering restaurants, including The Square - serving Balinese and international favourites - and fresh delights at Gourmet Bar, where drinks are served poolside. Little ones will adore the hotel's family-friendly facilities, including a fun-filled kids' club boasting a wealth of daily activities.
location_description: Novotel Bali Nusa Dua - Hotel and Residences
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Mengiat, Benoa, Kuta Selatan, Bali, 80363 Indonesia

title: Modern Kuta Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool Close to Segara Beach
description: Loud and proud Kuta is often the first port of call for new Bali visitors head to, so if that's you, make your base the Holiday Inn Express Baruna Bali, an IHG Hotel. Between enjoying sandy fun at Segara Beach, splashing about at the world-famous Waterbom Bali waterpark and exploring the street wares at local markets, enjoy quiet moments at your hotel where the rooftop infinity pool is the ideal place to escape the tropical heat and catch an epic sunset (with a cocktail in hand, of course).
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Baruna Bali, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jl. Wana Segara No.33A, Tuban, Bali, Indonesia, 80361
